name: Platformation (Motor)
description:
Platformation is a 2d platformer/ side scroller where you have a gun that doesn't kill enemies but it changes them into platforms

Shooting an enemy turns it into a normal platform, then a spring platform then back to being an enemy

the game is short and has only 11 levels which are mostly about the same length

i limited the game to using only 3 (technically 4 if you want to count transparent) to replicate what an nes could do 

Controls:

Wasd - Move

Space - Jump

Shift/K - Shoot
